title: Things are looking brighter for residents at Abbeyfield Fareham Society as they enjoy their new day ...

attachments.displayName: 04/11/13  TCTrust members and residents enjoy the new light and airy day room extension which has just been built at the Abbeyfields residential home in Fareham. (left to right), Ian Campbell, Roy Taylor of Abbeyfields, Rosie Thomas, Abbeyfields Gill Cairns, and Susan Stoneham.Picture: Ian Hargreaves  (133046-1)

object.content:
Things are looking brighter for residents at Abbeyfield Fareham Society as they enjoy their new day room extension.

Residents at the sheltered accommodation think it's wonderful and are using it every day. They even got to choose the carpets and furniture.

Here's some residents and trust members enjoying the new room, which was also used to host a party to mark the Society's 50th anniversary.
